original_title: Życiorys Brunona S. wyciągnięty z szuflady
overview: Black and white prints by Bruno Schulz take us to his room from pre-war Drohobych. Under the influence of quotes, objects are brought to life and green plants begin to appear on the surface of the antiquities. All of the things will be consumed by the fire.
title: The Life Story Of Bruno S. Retrieved From A Drawer
